title: SOLR with IBM Java will report JVMJ9VM007E on startup
description:
With the IBM Version of Java, SOLR with will report JVMJ9VM007E on startup:

JVMJ9VM007E Command-line option
unrecognised: -Xloggc

This is not the case when we use OpenJDK version of Java.

A workaround is to edit solr.in.sh, and comment out the offending option in GC_LOG_OPTS
